name: The Hand Made Tale
description:
The Hand Made Tale is a puzzle/speed game about hand shadows. And my first game!

You're supposed to form the gesture, with your hand, that could represent the shadowy object on the right. Some of the puzzles may be a bit too nonsensical and difficult, so don't feel to bad about checking the cheats.

And also on the speed mode my personal record is 52. Try beating that!

Controls:

a : little finger

s: ring finger

d: middle finger

f: index finger

spacebar: thumb

enter: select

esc: back
